dialog.text: Project has officially ground to a halt 😩  I was just getting into it as well.  I think I am further ahead than I thought, but I need to get something down for the security learning outcome.  Any progress your side?

joins.text: Sounds like things are looking up.

dialog.text: Mum keeps asking me to fix her laptop - I guess I have to put up with that now I'm at home :wink:  Got work off this weekend so I can concentrate on putting in a final push.  Have you got much more to do?

Douglas gave me a good piece of advice - concentrate on getting a little done for everything and then try and do more on a couple of learning outcomes.  You won't get a stella grade but you'll pass.  It is only first year after all 😌 Anyway, got to go - have a good weekend!
